rule.conditionDesc: ( problem.status in CurrentRecord != "Suspended" AND problem.status in SavedRecord = "Suspended")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run the "Incident Unsuspend" wizard. (when ( Status in CurrentRecord != "Suspended" AND Status in SavedRecord = "Suspended"))
